channel.title: Open-letters on LiKeqiang.org (非官方网站)
channel.description: Recent content in Open-letters on LiKeqiang.org (非官方网站)

item.title: Email sent to Li Keqiang begging for help
item.description: FROM: [陆** REDACTED FOR PRIVACY] SUBJECT: URGENT AND VERY IMPORTANT: victim of ill-treatment by the Taiyuan Police DATE: 2022-09-02 at 13:17 (Beijing time) TO: Mr. Li Keqiang, Premier of the State Council of the People’s Republic of China CC: Mr. Laurent Bili, French Ambassador to China, Mr. Philippe Righini, Consul general, and admin-francais.pekin-amba@diplomatie.gouv.fr Dear Mr. Li Keqiang, I love China and I will never do anything to hurt the country which has almost become my second motherland.
